description: [DarkGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1111) installation includes AutoIt script execution creating a shortcut to itself as an LNK object, such as bill.lnk, in the victim startup folder.(Citation: Ensilo Darkgate 2018) [DarkGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1111) installation finishes with the creation of a registry Run key.(Citation: Ensilo Darkgate 2018)

external_references.description: Adi Zeligson & Rotem Kerner. (2018, November 13). Enter The DarkGate - New Cryptocurrency Mining and Ransomware Campaign. Retrieved February 9, 2024.
